sentences.en: Centuries of statecraft had refined the concept of sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪的治国方法锤炼了民族主义哲学.

sentences.en: Hobbes argues for absolute, indivisible sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 霍布斯主张绝对且不可分割的王权.

sentences.en: How does he defend absolute sovereignty? What are the rights of the sovereign?
sentences.cn: 他如何为绝对的王权辩护? 王权的权力有哪些?

sentences.en: I, your vassal, have employed and troubled your unknown sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 我是您的臣子,以前不知道您就是公爵殿下,竟那样叫您受累, 麻烦了您.

sentences.en: In any case it was to Chenla that the sovereignty over Funan was transferred.
sentences.cn: 无论如何,对扶南的统治权是转移给真腊了.

sentences.en: In this agreement, Chiang Kai - shek completely sold out China's sovereignty over her air space.
sentences.cn: 蒋介石在这个协定里拍卖了中国的全部领空权.

sentences.en: It was the first convention to be applicable to the HKSAR after China's resumption of sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 这是香港回归祖国后,首条适用于香港特区的《国际劳工公约》.

sentences.en: Purpure, purple - Royal majesty , sovereignty and justice.
sentences.cn: 紫色 、 紫红色 - 王室尊严、君权、公正.

sentences.en: Purpure, purple - Royal majesty , sovereignty and justice.
sentences.cn: 紫色 、 紫红色 - 王室尊严、君权、公正.

sentences.en: The declaration proclaimed the full sovereignty of the public.
sentences.cn: 这份宣言宣告了这个共和国完全独立.

sentences.en: the defence of our national sovereignty
The definition of actual management organization is to protect tax sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 实际管理机构界定旨在保护税收权益.

sentences.en: The limitation of the self here for the free sovereignty there.
sentences.cn: 在“这里”限制自身,为的进到“那里”--自由的领土.

sentences.en: The story of Ahab and Naboth was also a story of God's sovereignty and justice.
sentences.cn: 亚哈王和拿伯的故事也是上帝权威和审判的故事.

sentences.en: The strength to do evil is sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 为非作歹的能力也是一种至高无上的权力.

words.tran_cn: 至高无上的；有主权的；拥有最高统治权的；不折不扣的；极好的
君主；独立国；最高统治者
[法]主权；主权国家；君主；独立国

trans.tran_cn: 国家的主权，君权，最高统治权，独立自主，主权国家
trans.tran_en: the power that an independent country has to govern itself
